Headline: Kimball-bound Brown and Linden-bound Purple Express Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown and Linden-bound Purple Express Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Sedgwick. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown and Linden-bound Purple Express Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Sedgwick.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
